feels.name: Satisfaction
feels.quote: Ferdinand made himself amends for the chagrin he had undergone by the exercise of those talents in which he excelled.

feels.name: Dissatisfaction
feels.quote: He saw that all his expectations of Count Melvil’s future favour were connected with his choice of a military life.

feels.name: Ambition
feels.quote: He resolved to rear a splendid fortune for himself.

causedBy.name: Desire for a fixed and firm foundation

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: He felt, by anticipation, the toils of hard duty upon the works, the horrors of night-alarms, cannonading, bombardment, sallies, and mines blown up.

feels.name: Relief
feels.quote: He resolved to submit himself to his destiny.

feels.name: Deceit
feels.quote: Ferdinand resolved to finish what the fugitive had imperfectly performed.

feels.name: Sneakiness
feels.quote: Ferdinand immediately comprehended the whole adventure and resolved to finish what the fugitive had imperfectly performed.

Events.name: Desire for a fixed and firm foundation
